definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: supr.; also NH [[דּוֹר]], Aram. (incl. B Aram.) [[דָּר]], dor, age, generation; Ar. dawrun gyrus, orbis, periodus; Sab. [[דר]], one time, once, [[דרם דרם]] each once in a year DHM in MV)—abs. [[דּוֹר]] Ge 7:1 + 68 t.; [[דּׂר]] Ex 3:15; 36 t.; cstr. [[דּוֹר]] De 32:20 + 7 t., [[דּׂר]] Ex 3:15; sf. [[דּוֹרִי]] Is 38:12, [[דּוֹרוֹ]] Is 53:8; pl. [[דּוֹרִים]] Ps 72:5 + 2 t., [[דּׂרוֹת]] abs. Job 42:16, Is 41:4; cstr. Ju Jdg 3:2; [[דּוֹרוֹת]] cstr. Is 51:9, [[דּׂרׂת]] Ge 9:12; sf. [[דּׂרׂתָיו]] Ge 6:9, Le 25:30, [[דּוֹרוֹתֵינוּ]] Jos 22:27, [[דּׂרׂתֵינוּ]] v:Jos 22:28, [[דּרׂתֵיכֶם]] Ge 17:12 + 27 t., [[דּׂרׂתָם]] Ge 17:7 + 10 t.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of duration in the past, former age(s) [[דּוֹרוֹת עוֹלָמִים]] Is 51:9 (‖[[קדם ימי]]); [[שְׁנוֹת דּׂר וׇדׂר]] De 32:7 (song; ‖[[ימות עולם]]); [[בְּדׂר וׇדׂר]] Ps 90:1 (cf. v:Ps 90:2); [[מוֹסְדֵי דּוֹר־וׇדוֹר]] Is 58:12 (‖[[חרבות עולם]]); [[שׁׂמֲמוֹת דּוֹר וׇדוֹר]] Is 61:4 (‖ id.)

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: apparently including both past and future [[בְּדוֹר דּוֹרִים שְׁנוֹתֶיךָ]] Ps 102:25; [[בְּכָל דּוֹר וׇדׂר]] Ps 145:13; [[לְדוֹר וׇדוֹר]] La 5:19.
of men living at a particular time (period, age), generation, as transitory [[דּוֹר הׂלֵח וְדוֹר בָּא]] Ec 1:4: specific.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in the present, and (or) the past Ge 7:1 (J) Ex 1:6 (P) Nu 32:13 (JE) De 1:35, De 2:14, Ju Jdg 2:10, Jdg 2:10, Is 53:8 (cf. Che crit. n.) Je 2:31; also Ps 95:10, Job 8:8, Is 41:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 3:2 (present & future); cf. pl. [[דּׂרׂתָיו]] Ge 6:9 (i.e. his own gen. and those immediately contiguous, before and after).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: esp. of a future generation Ge 15:16 (JE), with numeral, cf. De 23:3, De 23:4, De 23:9; also De 29:21, Ps 48:14, Ps 71:18, Ps 78:4, Ps 78:6, Ps 102:19, Ps 109:13, Joe 1:3 cf. Ps 22:30, Ps 22:31 (Che crit. n.); of a succession of generations [[דּוֹר לְדוֹר]] [[יְשַׂבַּח מַעֲשֶׂיךָ]] Ps 145:4; [[בְּכָל־דּוֹר וׇדוֹר]] Es 9:28; usually pl. [[לְדׂרׂת עוֹלָם]] Ge 9:12 (P); with num. [[לְאֶלֶף דּוֹר]] Ps 105:8 (‖[[עולם]]) = 1Ch 16:15 (‖[[לעולם]]); De 7:9; v. further, of posterity, [[אַרְבָּעָה דּׂרוֹת]] Job 42:16; usually pl. c. sf. Ge 17:7, Ge 17:9, Ge 17:12, Ex 12:14, Ex 12:17, Ex 12:42, Ex 16:32, Ex 16:33, Ex 27:21, Ex 29:42, Ex 30:8, Ex 30:10, Ex 30:21, Ex 30:31, Ex 31:13, Ex 31:16, Ex 40:15, Le 3:17, Le 6:11, Le 7:36, Le 10:9 (all P); Le 17:7, Le 21:17, Le 22:3, Le 23:14, Le 23:21, Le 23:31, Le 23:41, Le 23:43, Le 24:3, Le 25:30, (all H); Nu 9:10, Nu 10:8, Nu 15:14, Nu 15:15, Nu 15:21, Nu 15:23, Nu 15:38, Nu 18:23, Nu 35:29, Jos 22:27, Jos 22:28 (all P).

generation characterized by quality or condition, class of men: [[דּוֹר עִקֵּשׁ]] crooked generation De 32:5 (song) cf. v:De 32:20, Ps 78:8, Ps 78:8, Je 7:29; of diff. classes of wicked, Pr 30:11, Pr 30:12, Pr 30:13, Pr 30:14 cf. Ps 12:8; of the righteous, as a class Ps 14:5, Ps 24:6, Ps 73:15 ([[בָּנֶיךָ דּוֹר]]) Ps 112:2 (cf. Ps 22:30 MT, but < Che joins [[לדור]] to v:Ps 22:31 cf. supr. sub

definitions.title: 2 c
definitions.body: ); so also [[דּוֹר אֲבוֹתָיו]] i.e. the dead Ps 49:20 (so most; yet v. infr. sub
dwelling-place, habitation Is 38:12 cf. [[דּוּר]] vb., so Saad Ki Ges De Che RVm (Ew life ‖[[חַיַּי]]); so also Ps 49:20 De Witt, cf. Che:OP 479.
